website_summaries.verdict: Compact, inexpensive, and easy to use are great selling points for a stun gun, but when this device crackles like a livewire, the only thing worse than its bark, is its bite.

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few of these (different brands), none would last longer than a couple months. They'd stop holding charge for whatever reason. I wasn't doing anything out of the ordinary with them. I was lost and confused. Bought this one, its been going strong for many months now and showing no signs of slowing down. This one definitely lasts. I even went and ordered a second one (same monster brand). I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamal

customer_reviews.title: Crazy people on the BART beware
customer_reviews.text: Crazy people on the BART beware. I'm sick and tired of all the BART nuts and now I have something legal to protect my wife and I. I haven't used, but it sure lets off a fearsome noise and quite startling the first time you see it. About the size of a deck of cards but thicker. Fits right in the palm of your hands. Rechargeable with a slide out 120v plug. Nice to NOT use batteries for a change.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kim

customer_reviews.title: It comes with a protective case that easily opens with velcro
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so cute and unassuming looking, but it packs a mean punch! Perfectly sized to fit into a purse or backpack, and lightweight. It comes with a protective case that easily opens with velcro, and is very easy to operate. All it takes is switching the button to on (on the side) and pressing the button directly above the power switch. Easy to turn on and off, super cute zebra design, and from the sound and look when it is activated it is NO JOKE. Very pleased with this, and ordering additional units for late Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Alixandrea

customer_reviews.title: Buy one for your female friends!
customer_reviews.text: Female acquaintances have shown much appreciation. Concealed, discrete and powerful. Peace of mind on them = More relaxed dates
customer_reviews.author: MrGrave

customer_reviews.title: Like this a lot
customer_reviews.text: Like this a lot, haven't used it yet (knocking on wood) I think I just like the sound it makes reminds me of the back in the day cattle prod i use to have the sound alone strikes fear in the hearts of men. Hope I never have to really use it but if I do I'm going to rain down a lightning storm and 4th of July light show in that ass
customer_reviews.author: KamalR

customer_reviews.title: get a piece of mind
customer_reviews.text: Well I guess I love it - haven't had to use it. Well I did use the flash light. you can see the stun or charge (no batteries needed) so I guess if I have to use it will do it's thing so I am glad I have it and what a wonderful price and so easy to charge. Fits easy in my purse or pocket when out for a walk. Very light weight. Delivered as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela S

customer_reviews.title: This sucks, It only worked for a hour
customer_reviews.text: This sucks, It only worked for a hour. DONT BUY THIS ITEM UNLESS You need it for a flashlight. It won't protect you,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Isn't reliable to function properly.
customer_reviews.text: It worked one time for a test run (lasted about 3 sec). Then when showing my girlfriend how to use it (the one I purchased it for) it no longer worked. I assumed it just needed to be charged up, so I charged it for 4 hours - nothing. After 12 hours still nothing more than the flashlight.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter G. Carswell

customer_reviews.title: disguised
customer_reviews.text: what a great disguise for a stun gun, if i bring it out it looks like it could be a cell phone. No one would know what it was until it hit them...

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS THING
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS THING!!! I actually have two, one for my purse and one for the house! Bought this after some drunk dingleberry broke into our house and now I feel much safer! Super easy to use, and very cute on top of that

customer_reviews.title: Stun Gun
customer_reviews.text: Cant wait to use it but there are no volenteers. Ask my wife if I could take it with us on our date night, very exciting and painful. Not really! However its easy to charge up and the little light comes in handy. I keep it close to me just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Owen R. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and charge
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend bought this for me after a man came into my dorm room and laid in bed with my roommate...long story. Anyway it arrived fast with prime and worked well. I have not had to use it yet but I did test it in the hallway. Easy to use and charge. And it comes with a safe carrying case. Would rate 5 stars but I don't know how it works on people.

customer_reviews.title: Be wary
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these. They work but I wouldn't leave them charging near where children can get them. There's not a safety feature on them that locks it in the off position. Be wary.

The only redeeming factor is the fact that it sounds and looks very intimidating when it does work. I am just concerned about the safety aspect of this model due to the poor craftsmanship and design.

product_meta.title: Rechargeable Stun Gun Flashlight with Safety Switch, Fierce Power and Sound
feature_bullets: 18M VOLTS OF STOPPING POWER: This Monster stun gun delivers a monster voltage to immobilize an attacker, making it a powerful but non-lethal defense device.
COMPACT FLASHLIGHT: This pocket sized stun gun has a built-in LED flashlight, perfect for illuminating small areas, and fits neatly into a purse, backpack or pocket.
MASSIVE SOUND: This self defense stun device has a sound so fierce, it will deter any attacker with a push of a button before they get too close.
SAFE & SECURE: Designed with your safety in mind, the Monster flashlight with stun gun features an on/off safety switch to prevent accidental discharge.
RECHARGEABLE BATTERY: This incapacitating flashlight is always ready to go! Supplied with a fully rechargeable battery, just slide out the stun gun’s charging prong and plug into any outlet.
